feed.title: Make links on 'About Bitcoin Core' into clickable #4211

entry.title: Make links on 'About Bitcoin Core' into clickable #4211
entry.summary: As a new developer in the Bitcoin community, the individual is interested in contributing to the BitcoinQt project. Their first contribution was to make the links on the 'About Bitcoin Core' clickable. They believe this would enhance the user experience; however, some concern has been raised regarding potential difficulties with translating the page. The individual has submitted a pull request for their proposed changes on Github and is seeking feedback from other members of the community. The pull request can be found at: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/4211.
